Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 96th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2015...
Traded from Cincinnati to Brooklyn on 6/10/2016 (Going to BRO: P Marion Tobler, P Ryan Boston, P Dalton Tennison, P Bernard Coloma, 3B Fede Alfaro. Going to CIN: RF Jeffrey Corum, 3B John Losey,
CF Michael Turner)...
Had first career hit on 4/9/2018, off Daniel Helmer (SEA)...
Earned first career win on 5/3/2018...
Injured on 6/1/2018 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 8/6/2019 with a Torn Ligament Elbow, out for full season...
Injured on 3/2/2020 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 5 weeks...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $662,857 through salary arbitration...
Was claimed off waivers by San Francisco on 8/5/2021.
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $662,857 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/27/2022 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $662,857 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/9/2024 to a 2-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
